original_text: So Hamor and his son Shechem came to the gate of their city and spoke to the men of their city, saying,
korean_text: 하몰과 그의 아들 세겜이 그들의 성읍 문에 이르러 그들의 성읍 사람들에게 말하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: So Hamor and his son Shechem
came to the gate of their city
and spoke to the men of their city,
